=== Eating Lunch ===

The venue has asked us to provide a method of ensuring the right people get the provided lunch during the lunch hour. There will be a "lunch sticker" provided to you in the morning by Claire. Each sticker is different for each day, so before each day you will grab that day's sticker and place it on your badge. That sticker will get you into the lunch area for that day.

=== Places of Interest ===

* <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaud%C3%AD|Gaudí]]</nowiki> experience would include the monumental <nowiki>[[http://www.sagradafamilia.cat/sf-eng/docs_serveis/informacio.php|Sagrada Família]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.gaudiallgaudi.com/AA009.htm|la Pedrera]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.gaudiallgaudi.com/AA010.htm|Parc Güell]]</nowiki>.
* <nowiki>[[http://fundaciomiro-bcn.org/horari.php|Miró Foundation]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.barcelona-on-line.es/eng/turisme/bcn_gotic.htm|Barri Gòtic]]</nowiki> (medieval city of Barcelona)
* <nowiki>[[http://www.mnac.cat/visitamuseu/vis_horari.jsp?lan=003|MNAC]]</nowiki> National Contemporary Art Museum
* <nowiki>[[http://www.bcn.cat/museupicasso/en/visiting/planning.html|Picasso Museum]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://w3.bcn.es/V64/Home/V64XMLHomeLinkPl/0,4468,335907851_335946902_1_527399410,00.html?accio=detall&amp;home=&amp;linkDetalle=http://w3.bcn.es/V64/Home/V64XMLHomeLinkPl/0,4468,335907851_335946902_1_527399410,00.html?accio=detall|History City Museum]]</nowiki> (sorry, only Catalan and Spanish)
* <nowiki>[[http://www.fundacio.lacaixa.es/centros/cosmocaixabcnhoraris_ca.html|Cosmocaixa]]</nowiki>, Sciences Museum (sorry, only Catalan and Spanish)
* <nowiki>[[http://www.fcbarcelona.cat/web/english/club/club_avui/territori_barca/tour_guiat/tourguiat.html|Barcelona Football Club Museum]]</nowiki>

* Mind that on Wednesday 27 at 20:45 h, local time (CEST) begins the Football European Champions League Final, FC Barcelona vs. Manchester United, in Rome. That means bars plenty of people watching the match and a lot of firework noise if <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bar%C3%A7a|Barça]]</nowiki> wins.

==== Karaoke ====
* Date: Friday 29th May: ''' Karaoke Night'''
* Hours: 8pm to 12 am. The venue has been booked for the UDS attendees until 12 am, afterwards we are allowed to stay but it will be open to public.
* Meals: Tapas from 8pm to 9.30 pm (served with free drinks). After 9.30 pm each of us will get an extra drink.
* Venue: <nowiki>[[http://www.discotecanick.com|Disco Nick]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?daddr=Avinguda+de+Madrid,+160,+08028,+Barcelona&dirflg=&saddr=Av+Diagonal,+661,+08028,+Barcelona+(Hotel+Rey+Juan+Carlos+1)&f=d&hl=es&sll=41.388272,2.13521&sspn=0.01803,0.034332&ie=UTF8&z=15|Map]]</nowiki>
* Address: Avinguda de Madrid, 160, 08028, Barcelona 
* How to get there: L3-Zona Universitaria. Get off in Plaza del Centre and walk 5 minutes to Avenida Madrid: <nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&source=s_d&saddr=placa+del+centre+barcelona&daddr=Avinguda+de+Madrid,+160,+08028,+Barcelona&geocode=&hl=es&mra=ls&dirflg=w&sll=41.378821,2.13344&sspn=0.003607,0.009388&ie=UTF8&ll=41.38114,2.133461&spn=0.003606,0.009388&z=17|Map]]</nowiki>
* /!\ '''IMPORTANT:''' Bring your Ubuntu badge to enter.

=== Crew Assignments ===

Crew will be made up of Lo``Co and sponsored people who want to help with the logistics of planning the event. They will have different tshirts with "CREW" written on the back. This should be a rotating responsibility so that attendees can also be productive at UDS. Responsibilities include:
* A/V Assistance if needed
* Eazel and sign implementation and maintenance
* Help during registration
* Coordinate with the hotel on lunch delivery
* Making announcements
* Herding people like cattle into the first sessions and UDS-wide sessions.
* ... one of the other million things Claire ends up swamped with.
